name: Mahjong·
description:
Mahjong is best new matching game, play mahjong free!! Match all Majongs to win!

Challenge and train your brain by playing mahjong classic levels with the best free Mahjong solitaire matching tile board game.

Mahjong free games is one of the most popular puzzle games in the world, also known as Mahjongg and mah jong

Mahjong is similar to the popular windows Solitaire Card Game (klondike).

Features for you:

SIMPLE MATCHING GAME
Match mahjong tiles to win. It is easy to learn hard to master

PLAY MAHJONG LEVELS
Free Mahjong levels every day! Over 1400 levels! Travel around the world in your epic quest to become the best majong player!

JOIN 50,000 USERS
Over 50 thousand users play Mahjong to enjoy classic mahjang game

BEST FOR iPhone
Small game size! Classic mahjung tiles sets designed for mobile phones. Optimized matching experience for portrait mode.

HD GRAPHICS
Easy to read big mahjong tiles. Mahjong tile matching animations.

LEARN MAHJONG
Simple mahjong levels to learn mahong game. Undo feature. Hints show moves on hard majong puzzles

PLAY WITH NO WIFI
Offline mode. Play with no internet. No wifi needed!

FAST MATCHING GAME
Beat your best time for each level and see how fast you are compared to other players

AUTO WIN
Auto complete mah jongg levels to finish each level fast

SHARE MAHJONG GAMES
Win Mahjong levels and send your record time to your friends

CATS
Beat the boss cat every 10 mahjong levels to become the best majhong player

BEAUTIFUL TILES
4 sets of matching tiles including classic tiles

AUTHENTIC MAHJONG SOLITAIRE
If you played classic Windows Taipei or Shanghai Game, you will love Mahjong Match

Install Mahjong solitaire because it is one of the best matching games!
